title: Fullstack developer to SVEA
description:
Artificial intelligence is transforming society. AI Sweden is the national center for applied artificial intelligence and our mission is to accelerate the use of AI for the benefit of our society, our competitiveness, and for everyone living in Sweden. We drive impactful initiatives in areas such as healthcare, energy, and the public sector while pushing the boundaries of AI research and innovation in fields such as natural language processing and edge learning. Join us in harnessing the untapped value of AI to drive innovation and create sustainable value for Sweden.
   

  

 We are now expanding our team and looking for an experienced, curious, and solution-oriented
 **Full Stack Developer** 
 to help us build the next generation of AI-powered digital assistants.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are developing
 *Svea* 
 -a shared digital assistant for the Swedish public sector. The initiative brings together technology, law, data and ai adoption to create a common, reliable, and secure AI solution for thousands of users across Sweden.
   

  

 The project is now entering a major scale-up phase. As a Full Stack Developer, you will play a key role in taking Svea from prototype to a full-featured product. You’ll design intuitive user interfaces, integrate real-time interactions with powerful LLMs, and work closely with a small cross-functional team of developers and data scientists.
   

  

 Your work will directly influence how Sweden’s public sector adopts and uses generative AI.
   

  

**Your Main Responsibilities**
* Design and develop high-quality software solutions for interaction with generative AI
* Build user-friendly, responsive, and accessible interfaces based on Figma designs
* Collaborate with designers, developers, and data scientists throughout the development cycle
* Implement and optimize real-time UI features such as streaming responses and live updates
* Explore and evaluate new technologies to improve performance and user experience
* Help users analyze and visualize data through intuitive tools and workflows


**What You Bring (Must Have)**
* 4+ years of experience as a full-stack developer with modern web technologies
* Strong proficiency in PHP and experience with Laravel
* Experience working with real-time systems (WebSockets, Laravel Echo, Socket.io, Pusher or similar)
* Solid experience with Vue 3 and the Composition API
* Strong skills in TypeScript
* Experience with a client-side database (preferably RxDB or similar offline-first solutions)
* Good knowledge of SQL and relational databases (MySQL/PostgreSQL)
* Experience building and consuming RESTful APIs
* Basic experience with testing (PHPUnit/Pest and Vitest/Jest/VTL)
* Comfortable translating Figma designs into pixel-perfect interfaces


**Nice to Have**
* Experience building real-time UI interactions (streaming responses, notifications, chat-like UX)
* Performance optimization skills (caching, debouncing, indexing, lazy loading)
* Experience with monitoring and logging tools (Sentry, Grafana, Prometheus)
* Experience with event tracking and analytics for product insights
* Experience with AI-powered interfaces, RAG setups, or other data-intensive applications


**Who You Are**
 You’re someone who enjoys autonomy, takes initiative, and thrives in fast-paced, impact-oriented environments. You don’t need to be an AI expert, but you believe in the potential of AI to improve society and you want to contribute to that transformation.
   

  

 At AI Sweden, you’ll work alongside developers, linguists, policy specialists, journalists, historians, entrepreneurs, and leading AI researchers. We value diverse backgrounds and perspectives, and we believe they are essential to solving complex societal challenges.
   

  

 Why work for AI Sweden?
   

  

 To us, artificial intelligence is not only about tech, it’s a force for positive societal change. You'll be working alongside leading AI experts, scientists, journalists, linguists, policy professionals, entrepreneurs, change leaders, and many more. To work here, you don’t need to know “everything” about AI, but you need to believe in its potential to help shape our society for the better.
   

  

 As an organization, we’re uniquely positioned at the sweet spot of governmental influence and startup agility. Small enough to stay adaptive and have fun but backed by and in close contact with both the government, academia and private and public sector.
   

  

 Join us to make a real-world impact by contributing to initiatives that benefit society and tackle critical challenges. Be at the forefront of AI innovation, working with cutting-edge technologies and playing a key role in shaping the future of AI in Sweden.
   

  

 And, within our mission, we can most certainly be a platform empowering you to realize your ideas. AI Sweden’s ability to empower partners and individual team members to do exceedingly well in their profession is a key success factor for driving positive and significant impact.
   

  

 Naturally, we’re under a collective agreement (“kollektivavtal”) and offer everything that comes with it in terms of annual leave, pensions, wellness allowance (“friskvårdsbidrag”), and such.
   

  

 In short, we like to believe we offer our team members a place to grow, an environment for personal development.
   

  

 An equal and fair working environment
   

  

 We strongly believe in diversity and inclusion and are acutely aware of the skewed gender balance in our industry. We actively strive to put together a diverse team in terms of age, gender and background.
   

  

*At AI Sweden, we are committed to building diverse and inclusive teams. Some positions may be subject to export control regulations, which means that specific requirements may apply depending on the role. If relevant, we will inform you clearly during the recruitment process.*
**Application Deadline** 
 : 10th of January 2026
   

  

 If you have any questions or thoughts, don’t hesitate to contact
 **Viktoria Stark, viktoria.stark@ai.se**
*AI Sweden does not accept unsolicited support and kindly ask not to be contacted by any advertisement agents, recruitment agencies or manning companies.*

title: Graduate Software Engineer
description:
As the world's leader in digital payments technology, Visa's mission is to connect the world through the most creative, reliable and secure payment network - enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive. Our advanced global processing network, VisaNet, provides secure and reliable payments around the world, and is capable of handling more than 65,000 transaction messages a second. The company's dedication to innovation drives the rapid growth of connected commerce on any device, and fuels the dream of a cashless future for everyone, everywhere. As the world moves from analog to digital, Visa is applying our brand, products, people, network and scale to reshape the future of commerce.
   

  





 At Visa, your individuality fits right in. Working here gives you an opportunity to impact the world, invest in your career growth, and be part of an inclusive and diverse workplace. We are a global team of disruptors, trailblazers, innovators and risk-takers who are helping drive economic growth in even the most remote parts of the world, creatively moving the industry forward, and doing meaningful work that brings financial literacy and digital commerce to millions of unbanked and underserved consumers.
   

  





**You're** 
 an Individual.
 **We're** 
 the team for you.
 **Together** 
 , let's transform the way the world pays.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 At Tink, we deliver open banking solutions as a part of Visa. We’re creating the foundations that a new world of finance will be built on. By constantly challenging ourselves to go further and do better, we’re developing the ground-breaking services that businesses will use, to revolutionize the way millions of people manage their money. The world of financial services is changing fast, and we will continue to be at the forefront of it.
   

  





 Tink is building an open banking platform that enables banks, fintechs and startups to develop data-driven financial services. Through one API, Tink allows customers to access aggregated financial data, initiate payments, enrich transactions and build personal finance management tools. Tink connects to more than 3,400 banks that reach over 250 million bank customers across Europe. Our solutions are ready-to-go products, each developed to solve specific problems and bring value to both businesses and their customers.
   

  





 When joining our team as a graduate, you will have the opportunity to be at the centre of innovation in the payments industry and drive forward the implementation of the future of Visa.
   

  

  

  

 Software Engineering graduates may work across development, test and support on cool things like:
   

  




* Implementation of a single development lifecycle, from Analysis & Design, Build and QA to Security and Deployment.
* Support the needs of a new application using technologies like Java, REST Services, Micro Services Databases SQL & NoSQL, Docker, Hadoop, Bitbucket, Unix and Shell Scripting and more.
* Develop tools to improve processes.



 \*\* We don’t expect you to have years of experience — instead, we’re looking for graduates with the
 **right mindset, curiosity, and foundational skills** 
 to grow into outstanding engineers.
   

  





 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in office will be confirmed by your hiring manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**
* Graduating in 2026 from Bachelor's/Masters degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Computer applications and its related field, looking to start working in the summer 2026.
* Proficiency in at least one programming language or technology including, but not limited, to Java, C++, C# or Python.
* Knowledge of HTML, CSS, Angular, ML or AI is a plus.
* The ability to take on challenges and address problems head-on.
* Highly driven and resourceful.
* Strong ability to collaborate.


**Additional Information**

 This is a hybrid position. Hybrid employees can alternate time between both remote and office. Employees in hybrid roles are expected to work from the office 3 set days a week (determined by leadership/site), with a general guidepost of being in the office 60% or more of the time based on business needs.
   

  





 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.
   

  





 We may be able to offer financial relocation support to Stockholm for successful applicants.

title: React and Next.js Developer
description:
**About the role** 




 We are looking for React and Next.js developer to join our team in Stockholm. You will be working directly with our customers in dynamic and engaging projects. It is a great opportunity for a long term cooperation.
 



  





**About Provide IT** 




 Provide IT is an IT company with a long history. Our team works in a hybrid model from offices in Gothenburg and Stockholm. We focus on two business areas, consulting and digital agency. In consulting, our employees have a great opportunity to work with exciting clients. During these projects they learn a lot by working in diverse teams and on various projects. At the agency, we primarily develop customised websites, systems and applications for our customers. We offer attractive salary and benefits.
 



  





 Provide IT has a great company culture that is key for our employees. We also do a lot of team building activities.
 



  






 Join us and see for yourself!
 




  





**Required Skills** 



* 5+ years of experience in frontend / fullstack development
* Strong skills in React and Next.js
* Bonus if they have experience with Angular (but not required)
* Swedish speaker



  





 Hope to hear from you!

title: Backend developer
description:
We are looking for senior backend engineers to join us and expand our team of talented backend developers. You share a passion for building systems that delivers high business value without sacrificing maintainability, availability, scalability and quality. You will work on the backend systems that power our casino platform and help us deliver the best customer experience.
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop and help operate our systems
* Drive technical improvements throughout the stack
* Together with product teams deliver the best games and business solutions
* Help scale our solution to customer requirements and business opportunities


 Who you are
   

  

* You have 5+ years of experience working in a mixed Java, SQL, Javascript environment
* Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent
* You are passionate about working in an environment of continuous learning
* You are curious, driven and not afraid to take charge and improve the system and add automation where needed
* Taking on technical challenges and solving them is something you take pride in
* You have experience from working on large Java systems and have a solid understanding of performance, scalability and availability challenges of distributed systems
* Quality, not only of the code you write, but the delivered system is important to you
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and takes ownership of the change from editor to production system
* You know your way around a modern Unix/Linux system
* Experience with modern deployment, monitoring and logging solutions


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Junior Software Engineer
description:
Hedvig is rewriting the rules of insurance, proving that it’s possible to disrupt an entire industry while keeping people’s best interests at heart. We’re on a mission to make insurance genuinely great — and that starts with building products that deliver real value. As we continue to explore the opportunities created by modern engineering and emerging AI technologies, we’re looking for someone eager to learn, grow, and contribute to building outstanding product experiences.
 



  





**What about the role?** 




 We are looking for a junior software engineer who wants to learn from experienced teammates while contributing directly to the development of Hedvig’s products. You will work across parts of our stack, collaborate closely with product and design, and help build features that make a real difference for our members.
 



  





 You’ll work with our modern tech stack, which includes:
 



 - Back-end services in Kotlin with Spring Boot
 



 - Web with Next.js and Vercel
 



 - Native mobile apps in Swift and Kotlin
 



 - GraphQL as our API layer
 



 - Micro-service architecture
 



 - Hosting on AWS
 



  





 You’re not expected to know all of this from day one. What matters is that you’re curious, willing to learn, and comfortable diving into unfamiliar technologies with support from the team.
 



  





**What about you?** 




 You have a solid foundation in software engineering and a genuine interest in modern development practices. You may have limited industry experience, but you’ve built things, at work, in school or on your own, and you’re excited to keep improving your craft.
 



  





 We believe you’ll thrive here if you:
 



 - Have 0–2 years of professional experience as a software engineer, or strong internship/project experience
 



 - Have a good understanding of computer science fundamentals
 



 - Enjoy learning new technologies and exploring how to use them effectively
 



 - Are curious about how AI can enhance products and engineering workflows, even if you’re early in your experience with it
 



 - Like working collaboratively with designers, product managers, and fellow engineers
 



 - Care about writing clean, maintainable code and improving your skills over time
 



 - Are motivated by solving real user problems and building valuable product experiences
 



  





**What about us?** 




 At Hedvig, we challenge assumptions, push boundaries, and believe great ideas can come from anywhere. We foster a culture of trust, ownership, and continuous learning, where engineers of all experience levels can grow and make a real impact.
 



 We embrace mistakes, learn from them, and move forward - fostering a culture of curiosity, accountability, and growth.

title: Software Engineer - Mobile
description:
**About Sana**
 Sana is an AI lab building superintelligence for work.
   

  

 We believe organizations can accomplish their missions faster when humans can effortlessly access knowledge, automate repetitive work, and learn anything with the help of agentic AI.
   

  

 As part of Workday, we are committed to building AI that augments humans.
   

  

 If that’s a mission that excites you, you’re in the right place.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a software engineer at Sana you'll build and maintain cross-platform mobile apps that deliver seamless user experiences on iOS and Android. You'll collaborate with designers and engineers to create new features, optimize performance, and ensure a smooth UI. Your days will involve writing clean code, debugging, and integrating third-party APIs to enhance functionality. This is a great opportunity to build top-tier mobile experiences in a rapidly scaling company at the forefront of AI-driven workplace learning.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Develop and maintain high-performance React Native applications for iOS and Android. This involves working on the ReactNative/TS codebase that shares code with the web client, and also working full-stack to implement Node.js/TS backend endpoints for the app.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers and developers to define, design, and ship new features while ensuring code quality through reviews and best practices.
* Manage the app submission and publishing process for both iOS and Android platforms, ensuring compliance with all guidelines and requirements.


 Your background looks something like
   

  

* 3+ years of experience in a similar position.
* Proficiency in React Native, TypeScript, general tooling in the React Native ecosystem, and crafting high-quality user interfaces that users will love.
* Strong understanding of mobile development fundamentals, including performance optimization and native integrations.
* Experience building complex and reusable UI components for mobile applications.
* Commitment to writing clean, maintainable, and scalable code for cross-platform mobile apps.


****What we offer****
* Help shape AI's future alongside brilliant minds from Notion, Dropbox, Slack, Databricks, Google, McKinsey, and BCG.
* Competitive salary complemented with a transparent and highly competitive options program.
* Swift professional growth in an evolving environment, supported by a culture of continuous feedback and mentorship from senior leaders.
* Work with talented teammates across 5+ countries, and collaborate with customers globally
* Regular team gatherings and events (recently in Italy and South Africa)

title: Senior Frontend/Fullstack Developer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Mycket goda kunskaper i React och Next.js.
* Erfarenhet av headless e-handel, gärna Medusa.js.
* Trygg med Node.js för integrationer och backendlogik i headless-miljö.
* God förståelse för API-integrationer och moderna dataflöden.
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD och Docker.
* Erfarenhet av versionshantering i Git.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att bygga skalbara, prestandaoptimerade och SEO-vänliga gränssnitt.


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av Kubernetes.
* Erfarenhet av PHP/Laravel eller andra backendmiljöer.
* Erfarenhet av att bygga lösningar för internationella marknader.
* Intresse och förståelse för UX och interaktionsdesign.
* Erfarenhet av designsystem (t.ex. Storybook eller shadcn/ui).


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 02-12-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Frontend-utvecklare
description:
**Hey! 👋** 




  






 Cone is looking for a talented senior front-end developer to join our team!
 
 If you’re excited about building for some of the world’s most ambitious e-commerce brands, love taking ownership of your work, and want to make a real impact - both on our projects and on the company’s direction - we’d love to have you on the team.
 



  





**This role is ideal for someone who:** 




  




* **Is an exceptional developer** 
 - writes clean, scalable, and maintainable code while staying current with modern web technologies.
* **Drives technical progress** 
 - explores new tools and approaches, enhances our tech stack, and helps keep us at the forefront of modern web development.
* **Enjoys close collaboration with clients** 
 - understanding their needs, discussing trade-offs, and finding smart, practical solutions.
* **Thrives in a fast-paced, multi-project environment** 
 , managing priorities without compromising on quality.
* **Leads through action** 
 , mentoring other developers, promoting best practices, and fostering a culture of technical excellence.



  





**About Cone** 





 At Cone, we partner with Sweden’s top e-commerce brands, helping them create seamless, beautiful, and fast online experiences. Some of our amazing clients include Nelly, Kids Brand Store, and Skistar. We combine a passion for design and user experience with cutting-edge technologies, delivering quality in every project.
 




  





**Responsibilities** 



* Build fast, accessible, high-performing headless e-commerce storefronts using React, Next.js, and modern tooling
* Collaborate closely with designers to translate high-fidelity designs into pixel-perfect implementations
* Work with APIs, headless CMS platforms, and e-commerce backends like Shopify, Centra, or Brink
* Contribute to high coding standards, performance optimization, and overall project quality across the team



  





**Qualifications** 



* 5+ years of experience working with JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Comfortable leading and juggling multiple projects at once.
* Fluent in both written and spoken English.
* A strong eye for design and user experience.
* A proactive, leadership-oriented mindset.



  





**What’s in It for You?** 





 At Cone Digital, you’ll work on exciting projects, collaborate with an exceptional team, and have the opportunity to shape the future of e-commerce development. Plus, you’ll get the satisfaction of seeing your work shine for some of the most recognizable brands in the industry.
 




  






 Ready to take your skills to the next level and create amazing things?
 




  






 Join us at Cone Digital!

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Role**
**The team:** 
 Our team consists of 8-10 engineers and is responsible for an application for delivery of optimization services for large financial institutions. We leverage modern technologies like Python, Kotlin, React, and Typescript to build a scalable and robust platform. We value working with passionate, talented and nice people who have fun together, while pushing ourselves and our systems to improve continuously. Our architecture is clean and modern and based upon patterns like automated testing, modulation, clear boundaries and clear responsibilities, and we believe in continuous and iterative delivery, fail fast, prototyping and continuous feedback from internal and external clients.
   

  

**The impact:** 
 OSTTRA is a FinTech company at the heart of the global financial system, dedicated to building the future of post-trade. We keep our eyes on the horizon, always on the lookout for new possibilities and opportunities while staying with our feet on the ground, making sure we deliver rock solid services that our clients rely on for their daily business and success. Our optimisation services create distinct positive impacts to client portfolio risk profiles and operational costs. When our services execute, global metrics of systemic risks in the financial markets improve significantly. Long-term value to the client is the most important goal of our team, and your contribution in the form of delivery, improvements and innovations can have a significant impact on the financial system.
   

  

**What’s in it for you:** 
 We strongly believe in individual growth and have long experience in guiding early careers engineers in our modern approach to software production, which includes:
   

  

* Rapid, iterative and phased delivery, backed by automated testing and deployment frameworks.
* Streamlined, autonomous and independent teams, optimised and supported for fast change.
* Clean architecture for maintainable, scalable, and flexible code, aligned with the team structures and with clear boundaries and responsibilities.
* Innovative culture with strong focus on exploration and prototyping, where failing fast is a virtue which drives technological and product improvements.


**Software Engineer Position Profile**
 We are seeking a passionate and talented individual to join our innovative and forward-thinking team as a Software Engineer. Our company is at the forefront of rapid, iterative, and phased delivery, backed by cutting-edge automated testing and deployment frameworks. We believe in streamlined, autonomous, and independent teams that are optimised and supported for swift adaptability. Our commitment to clean architecture ensures maintainable, scalable, and flexible code, aligned with team structures and defined responsibilities.
   

  

 We leverage a modern tech stack that includes Python, Django, and Kotlin for our backend services, React and Typescript for our frontend development, and MySQL as our database. We also utilize a range of supporting technologies such as Redis, Cassandra, ZooKeeper, and RabbitMQ. Our infrastructure is built on open-source foundations, with Linux, Docker, and Kubernetes enabling us to deploy and manage our services efficiently in a cloud environment.
   

  

**Role Overview:** 
 As a Software Engineer, you will contribute to the success of our projects using your focus, talent, passion, and grit. We are looking for candidates who hold a Master's degree in Computer Science or have equivalent education or background, and have 3-5 years of relevant work experience. We foster an innovative culture that places a strong emphasis on exploration and prototyping. Here, failing fast is seen as a virtue, propelling technological and product improvements.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Collaborate with cross-functional, autonomous teams for rapid and phased delivery.
* Uphold clean architecture principles to ensure code maintainability, scalability, and flexibility.
* Contribute to an innovative culture through exploration, prototyping, and a willingness to take calculated risks.
* Engage in continuous learning to stay abreast of the latest technologies and industry best practices.


**Qualifications**
* Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent background.
* 0-5 years of relevant experience.
* Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for learning.
* Demonstrated ability to work effectively in an autonomous and collaborative environment.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to contribute ideas to a diverse team.


 If you are a tech enthusiast with a thirst for innovation and a desire to contribute to an exciting and fast-paced environment, we invite you to apply for this position. Join us as we redefine the boundaries of technology and drive impactful change in the industry.
   

  

**About OSTTRA**
*Candidates should note that OSTTRA is an independent firm, jointly owned by S&P Global and CME Group. As part of the joint venture, S&P Global provides recruitment services to OSTTRA - however, successful candidates will be interviewed and directly employed by OSTTRA, joining our global team of more than 1,200 post trade experts.*
 OSTTRA was formed in 2021 through the combination of four businesses that have been at the heart of post trade evolution and innovation for the last 20+ years: MarkitServ, Traiana, TriOptima and Reset. OSTTRA is a joint venture, owned 50/50 by S&P Global and CME Group.
   

  

 With an outstanding track record of developing and supporting critical market infrastructure, our combined network connects thousands of market participants to streamline end to end workflows - from trade capture at the point of execution, through portfolio optimization, to clearing and settlement.
   

  

 Joining the OSTTRA team is a unique opportunity to help build a bold new business with an outstanding heritage in financial technology, playing a central role in supporting global financial markets.
   

  

 Learn more at www.osttra.com.
   

  

**What’s In It For** 
**You?**
**Benefits**
 We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S&P Global.
   

  

**Our Benefits Include**
* Health & Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
* Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
* Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
* Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
* Family Friendly Perks: It’s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families.
* Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.


 For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit-summaries
   

  

**Recruitment Fraud Alert**
 If you receive an email from a spglobalind.com domain or any other regionally based domains, it is a scam and should be reported to reportfraud@spglobal.com. S&P Global never requires any candidate to pay money for job applications, interviews, offer letters, “pre-employment training” or for equipment/delivery of equipment. Stay informed and protect yourself from recruitment fraud by reviewing our guidelines, fraudulent domains, and how to report suspicious activity here.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.
   

  

 If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person.
   

  

**US Candidates Only:** 
 The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf describes discrimination protections under federal law. Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision - https://www.dol.gov/sites/dolgov/files/ofccp/pdf/pay-transp\_%20English\_formattedESQA508c.pdf
   

  

 20 - Professional (EEO-2 Job Categories-United States of America), BSMGMT203 - Entry Professional (EEO Job Group)
   

  

**Job ID:** 
 319214
   

  

**Posted On:** 
 2025-11-24
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden

title: Software Engineer - Fullstack
description:
*Vill du vara med och skapa framtidens digitala bankupplevelse – i hela stacken – tillsammans med andra som brinner för teknik och samhällsnytta?*
 Vi söker fler engagerade utvecklare som vill vara med och forma nästa generations digitala tjänster för sparande, investeringar och bank. Hos oss kombineras teknikintresse med samhällsengagemang – i team där gemenskap, samarbete och inkludering är en självklar del av vardagen. Vi tror på ett arbetsliv där det går att vara både ambitiös och mänsklig, där balans och meningsfullhet är lika viktiga som innovation.
   

  

 Teknisk skicklighet är förstås viktigt – men hos oss är det lika avgörande att du tycker om att samarbeta, dela kunskap och bidra till en öppen och omtänksam teamkultur.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Fullstackutvecklare hos oss arbetar du i ett agilt och självstyrande team med stort ansvar – från idé till produktion. Du tar ägarskap över dina lösningar i hela ledet och bidrar med både frontendutveckling i Angular och robust backend-arkitektur i Java.
   

  

 Du Får Jobba Med Modern Java, Mikrotjänstarkitektur Och Avancerade Frontendlösningar i En Miljö Där Vi Hela Tiden Lär Av Varandra, Testar Nytt Och Strävar Efter Att Göra Skillnad För Riktiga Användare. I Rollen Ligger Flera Viktiga Uppgifter Som Att
   

  

* Designa, utveckla och vidareutveckla moderna web-appar inom teamets domän
* Ta helhetsansvar för din kodbas i både frontend (Angular) och backend (Java)
* Delta i tekniska designprocesser och ta fram beslutsunderlag
* Säkerställa att frontend byggs enligt Avanzas best practices och UX-riktlinjer
* Bidra aktivt i teamets planering, samarbeten och kontinuerliga förbättringsarbete
* Automatisera och optimera affärsflöden i nära samarbete med teamet, Product Managers och verksamheten


**Så här jobbar vi**
 Vi är ca 35 autonoma utvecklingsteam som har fullt ägarskap över sin produkt, sin roadmap och sina tekniska val. Vi arbetar datadrivet och iterativt, med fokus på att skapa verkligt värde för användarna och samtidigt bevara en hållbar utvecklingstakt.
   

  

 Parprogrammering och mobbprogrammering är en naturlig del av vår vardag, liksom gemensam design och kodgranskning. Lärande sker tillsammans, genom stöd och nyfikenhet – och vi firar våra framsteg, stora som små.
   

  

**Vi tror att du**
* Har några års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet som Fullstackutvecklare
* Är bevandrad inom både frontend (Angular eller React), och backend (Java)
* Kan bygga och underhålla webbapplikationer i produktion
* Stark kompetens i HTML, CSS, JavaScript
* Skriver välstrukturerad, testbar och skalbar kod
* Är nyfiken, kommunikativ och trivs med att arbeta tillsammans med andra
* Har ett helhetstänk och vill bidra till både teamets och produktens utveckling
* Gillar en kultur där det är okej att fråga, dela, misslyckas och växa


 Har du också erfarenhet från techbolag, bank eller finans är det såklart meriterande. Även UX-erfarenhet eller samarbete med designers.
   

  

**En kultur för gemenskap och hållbarhet**
 Vi tror att de bästa resultaten uppstår i trygga team där alla får komma till tals. Därför lägger vi stor vikt vid samarbete, öppenhet och arbetsglädje. Vi strävar efter jämställda team där alla känner sig trygga att vara sig själva och bidra med sin unika kompetens. Hos oss får du utrymme att utvecklas i din egen takt och kombinera arbetet med ett hållbart liv.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Skicka din ansökan genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök” nedan. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, sista dag för ansökan är den
 **20/12.**
 Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

*Erbjudanden från rekryteringsföretag/annonssäljare undanbedes.*
 Avanza är Sveriges ledande plattform för sparande och placeringar. Vi drivs av att förändra branschen genom att utmana de stora bankerna och försäkringsbolagen på den svenska sparmarknaden. Vi vill vara tjänsten som förenklar och förbättrar spararnas ekonomi, oavsett om man älskar aktier eller bara vill ha ett bra sparande. Vår vision är att skapa en bättre framtid för miljoner människor. Därför står våra kunders bästa alltid i fokus, precis som det borde vara. Affärsidén är enkel – mer till dig, mindre till banken. En idé som gett oss Sveriges nöjdaste sparare 15 år i rad.

title: Software Engineer BE
description:
**Juni who? 👋** 




 At Juni, we’re busy building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.
 



  





**How & why we do it 🚀** 




 We give our people the same thing we’re building for our customers: freedom. Freedom to be 100% yourself. Freedom to explore your potential and what’s more – make the most of it. We truly believe we’re making the world a better place for online businesses, and we want you to be a part of that mission.
 



  





**Your role at a glance 🤸 ♀️** 




 You’ll tackle complex challenges and develop clean, scalable solutions. We're looking for someone who’s genuinely passionate about designing and implementing elegant and high-quality software. Staying up to date with your development ecosystem, you’ll make sound choices on tools and libraries for each project. You'll contribute across the entire product stack and collaborate to maintain codebase integrity. Ideally, you have experience with technical challenges related to bank transfers and card payments, or you’re motivated to work in a high-stakes, regulated environment. Most importantly, you consistently connect your work to the broader goals of the business.
 



  





**Your responsibilities 👏** 




 In this role, you’ll:
 


* Write scalable, robust, testable, efficient, and easily maintainable code using Golang
* Translating software requirements into stable, working, high-performance software
* Participate in architectural and design decisions, creating and reviewing proposals and polishing them through team collaboration
* Work on key projects related to the kyb and customer domain: kyb flows, notifications, pricing, cashback, credit assessments and obligations, funding providers, risk scoring, fincrime management, customer profile, etc.
* Participate in product monitoring, incident management, on-call support and customer support.



  





**Tooling ⚙️** 



* Slack
* G-suite
* Golang
* AWS SQS, Kinesis, DynamoDB, Lambda.
* PostgreSQL
* Kafka
* Datadog
* Gitlab
* Kubernetes
* Terraform



  





**Qualifications 👑** 




  





 What we need to see
 


* Extensive Experience: A few-years experience in software engineering, with a sustained growth and a hunger to grow into a senior level.
* Technical Expertise: Good understanding and hands-on experience with backend.
* Problem-Solving Skills: Good analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a focus on finding efficient and effective solutions to complex technical challenges.
* Development Standards: Up-to-date knowledge of development standards, methodologies, and best practices, including Agile and DevOps.
* Security Practices: Good understanding of security best practices to ensure the integrity and safety of applications.
* Code Quality: Experience with code reviews, testing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to maintain high code quality.
* Collaboration: Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively within a team and across departments.
* Ownership and Accountability: A willingness to take ownership of tasks and projects, ensuring timely and high-quality delivery.
* Adaptability: Comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and adapting to changing priorities and requirements.
* Stellar communication skills in English.



  





 What we’d love to see
 


* Experience with kyb flows, billing systems, especially Lago, credit.
* Experience in a regulated environment and how this impacts engineering decisions. Ideally in bank transfers or cards domains.
* Experience in fast-paced startups.
* Production experience with Golang.



  





**Your people 👥** 




 Our team is as ambitious as our amazing customers. We aim high and we move with speed to make our vision a reality. We care deeply about building a better future for our customers and each other. Here, you can work with people at the top of their game and who didn’t get there by playing games. You can help us create a whole new category in financial services.
 



  





**Your benefits 😍** 




 We’re freedom-first. Transparent. Caring. Empowering. So our benefits are too.
 


* **We work hybrid.** 
 We'll see you in one of our offices in Stockholm or Gothenburg at least two days per week.
* **Swap 2D for 3D** 
 . Meet all Junis IRL at the company onsite each year.
* **Diversity is at our core** 
 . We're part Swedish. Part Canadian. Part French. Part Indian. Part Italian. Part British. Part Portuguese. You get the idea.
* **Great players can stay great players** 
 . Progress your career whether you choose to manage people or not.
* **RSU (Restricted Stock Units)** 
 . We can’t promise you’ll make a fortune. But we’ll give it our very best shot.
* **Vacation days** 
 . 30 days.
* **Private Health insurance** 
 . You know. Just in case
* **Beautiful offices** 
 in central Gothenburg and Stockholm, front row sea view!



  





**Additional information 📌** 



* Please note that we are unable to sponsor work visas at this time. Therefore, having a valid work permit for Sweden is a requirement for this role.
* Dear recruitment agencies: we love your enthusiasm, but no calls, emails, or carrier pigeons, please. We’re keeping this one in-house

title: iOS Software Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 Are you driven to create exceptional
 **mobile experiences** 
 ? We're seeking skilled and motivated
 **iOS Software Engineers** 
 , both
 **Senior** 
 and
 **Mid-Level** 
 , to help shape the future of our mobile products. In this role, you'll collaborate closely with Product Managers, Engineering Managers, and cross-functional teams to bring business requirements to life on iOS, while upholding best-in-class coding standards.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Design, develop, and maintain robust iOS applications using Swift and UIKit, SwiftUI.
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and fellow developers to define requirements and deliver user-centric features.
* Contribute to architectural decisions and help shape technical direction.
* Support and mentor team members, sharing knowledge and encouraging best practices.
* Conduct code reviews and ensure high standards of code quality and maintainability.
* Troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges, including performance and concurrency issues.
* Stay current with iOS development trends and evaluate new tools and frameworks.
* Work closely with backend teams to integrate APIs and ensure seamless data flow.
* Partner with QA to ensure thorough testing and smooth deployment.
* Participate in Agile/Scrum processes, contributing to sprint planning and estimations.
* Share insights and learnings to foster a culture of continuous improvement.


**Who You’ll Work With**
 Our product teams are dedicated to building advanced internal tools that support data-driven decision-making across product development. We focus on analyzing test variations, interpreting performance data, and delivering insights that help product teams optimize feature rollouts. By collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, we ensure that new features are launched efficiently and effectively. Through continuous learning and iteration, we contribute to innovation and excellence in user experience across the organization.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We are looking for people with...
   

  

* Swift, UIKit & SwiftUI Proficiency: Solid experience building iOS apps using Swift and SwiftUI. Senior candidates should demonstrate deep expertise and guide others in advanced UI development.
* Architecture & Design Patterns: Understanding of MVVM or similar patterns. Senior developers are expected to lead architectural decisions and design scalable solutions.
* iOS SDK Knowledge: Familiarity with key frameworks like UIKit, Core Data, and Core Animation. Senior candidates should know how to integrate these effectively with SwiftUI.
* UI/UX Collaboration: Ability to work closely with designers to deliver intuitive, polished interfaces. Seniors should provide design feedback and ensure pixel-perfect implementation.
* Performance & Optimization: Experience identifying performance bottlenecks and using tools like Instruments. Senior developers should lead to optimization efforts.
* Networking & API Integration: Comfortable working with RESTful APIs, async calls, and error handling. Seniors should design robust networking layers.
* Debugging Skills: Strong troubleshooting abilities using Xcode tools. Senior developers should handle complex issues and support others in debugging.
* Team Contribution: Mid-level developers should be collaborative and open to learning. Senior developers are expected to mentor, lead code reviews, and foster team growth.
* Communication: Clear communicators who can work effectively across teams. Senior candidates should also drive technical discussions and decision-making.


 And people who have:
   

  

* Problem-Solving Skills: A logical and creative mindset to tackle challenges and deliver effective solutions, even under pressure.
* Collaborative Spirit: The ability to work seamlessly with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and backend developers.
* Interpersonal Communication: A clear and thoughtful approach to articulating ideas, technical concepts, and feedback, both in writing and verbally.
* Adaptability: Comfort with navigating change, learning new tools, and adjusting to evolving project needs.
* Growth Mindset: Openness to feedback and a drive to continuously improve and grow professionally.


**Who We Are**
**H&M Group** 
 is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  

 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE**
 At
 **H&M Group,** 
 we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  

* Staff discount card: Usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online.
* H&M Incentive Program (HIP): Included in our HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
* Competitive pensions: Collective Agreement and ITP pensions competitive to the Swedish market.
* Generous vacation: 30 days' vacation, health care allowance, and good work-life balance.
* Additional perks: Discounts from Benify.
* Innovative Environment: Work with cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions.
* Global Impact: Be part of a team that influences users worldwide.
* Professional Growth: Endless opportunities to learn and develop your skills.
* Collaborative Culture: Join a motivated team that values collaboration and excellence.


**JOIN US**
 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

 This is a full-time permanent position, starting as soon as possible according to the agreement. The role is a hybrid position, based in our office in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 Apply by sending in your
 **CV in English** 
 as soon as possible. Due to data policies, we only accept applications through the career page.
   

  

 Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here. We are eager to meet you!
   

  

* We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.

title: Utvecklare Dynamics 365 F&O
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
 Vill du vara en del av en av
 **Sveriges Bästa Arbetsplatser** 
 , enligt Great Place to Work? Sopra Steria är ett ledande IT-konsult- och managementbolag som flera år i rad har utsetts till
 **Karriärföretag** 
 och rankas av Gartner som en av de fem bästa inom Digital Transformation. Vi söker nu en driven utvecklare med erfarenhet av Dynamics 365 F&O för att förstärka vårt team.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 I rollen som utvecklare inom Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations kommer du att ansvara för att utveckla och integrera affärslösningar för våra kunder inom olika branscher. Du kommer att arbeta med att anpassa systemet efter kundernas specifika behov och integrera Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations med andra system för att säkerställa smidiga affärsflöden.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter kommer att inkludera:**
* Utveckling och anpassning av funktionalitet i Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations med hjälp av X++ och C#.
* Skapande och hantering av integrationer med hjälp av Azure Integration Services för att koppla Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations med externa system.
* Design och implementering av integrationer via REST API för att möjliggöra sömlös kommunikation mellan olika plattformar och system.
* Delta i förstudier och workshops för att förstå kundens behov och krav samt bidra till lösningsdesign.
* Testning och validering av utvecklade lösningar för att säkerställa att de möter både funktionella och tekniska krav.


**Vi söker dig som:**
* Har minst 3 års erfarenhet som utvecklare inom Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations.
* Har goda kunskaper i X++, C# och Azure Integration Services.
* Har tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med integrationer mellan Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations och andra system via REST API.
* Har ett starkt intresse för att arbeta med tekniska lösningar som stödjer affärsprocesser och vill bidra med din expertis till innovativa projekt.


**Vad vi erbjuder:** 
 Hos Sopra Steria får du möjlighet att arbeta med några av de mest spännande kunderna och projekten på marknaden. Vi erbjuder en dynamisk och stödjande arbetsmiljö där du får chansen att växa och utvecklas inom ditt område. Som en del av vårt Business Applications-team kommer du att samarbeta med erfarna kollegor som delar din passion för teknik och utveckling.
   

  

**Ansök:** 
 Om du vill vara med och forma framtidens affärslösningar och arbeta i en organisation som sätter sina medarbetare i fokus, skicka in din ansökan idag! För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Christer Söderholm på christer.soderholm@soprasteria.com
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Product Developer & Buyer – Training Equipment
description:
Casall was founded in 1984 with a clear purpose: to merge advanced textile craftsmanship with the natural movement of the human body — driven by a passion for design. From the beginning, we set out to prove that performance and style can elevate each other, in everything from the garments we wear to the equipment we train with.
 



  





 For over four decades, this mission has guided us as we’ve created products that intuitively work with the body: apparel that adapts to movement and boost confidence, equipment that unlocks potential, and accessories that support the journey. Each detail created to feel as good as it looks, and to perform as beautifully as it inspires.
 



  





 We are now looking for a
 **Product Developer & Buyer** 
**for Casall’s training equipment/hard good** 
 s
 **(parental leave cover)** 
 , designed for longevity with a Bodycentric approach, bold yet sophisticated aesthetics, and durable and high-performing quality
 



  





**About the Role** 




 In the role as you will be responsible for a wide range of products, from yoga mats, weights, foam products like yoga blocks and foam rollers, gloves, and other accessories such as water bottles. You will be part of and have great possibility to influence the process from idea to selling point as well as following up on the stock levels and sales as a part of the buying practice and assortment evaluation. Product development is teamwork, and you will have many touchpoints both internally and externally, such as designers, suppliers and the marketing department.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





 Product Development
 


* In close collaboration with the designers develop products in accordance with Casall’s design philosophy: Innovatively designed for longevity with a Bodycentric approach, bold yet sophisticated aesthetics, and durable and high-performing quality.
* Product development in close collaboration with suppliers, including packaging.
* Actively develop a commercial and profitable product portfolio by staying updated on industry trends and actively propose new products and innovations to strengthen Casall’s brand position.
* Establish effective processes and communication with suppliers to deliver against the set strategy, targets, and deadlines.
* In collaboration with Assortment Development & Sustainability Manager, ensure that the development and final product meet, as a minimum, Casall's sustainability targets and requirements, as well as legal requirements.
* Drive and maintain Casall's sustainability and quality policies towards the supply chain.
* Quality assurance
* If needed, carry out visits to factories (Asia), approx. 10-15 travelling days per year.



  





 Purchasing, inventory control and administration
 


* Support assortment evaluation through data analysis and research for every development cycle to elaborate and enhance brand and assortment strategy in line with the business plan.
* Article administration. Ex. collection and validation of material and product certificates to ensure that master data is in line with requirements.
* Responsible for price negotiations with suppliers to meet set margin targets.
* Monitor and analyze stock levels and sales on a weekly basis to make sure stock levels are in line with need and stock level targets as well as to support decisions on activations, phase outs etc.
* Planning and execution of order placement in a multi-channel setting, and work closely with the activewear Product Developer & Buyer to support the wear buying during peak periods.



  





**Who You Are** 




  





 Personal abilities
 


* Business-oriented, structured, and results-driven, thriving in a fast-paced environment.
* Solution-oriented, flexible, and proactive, with a strong hands-on mentality.
* Independent
* Communicative
* Down-to-earth teamplayer
* Good analytical skills
* Great interest in training and preferably also sustainability



  





 Requirements
 


* 3-5+ years of experience within sourcing, product development and buying, preferably within hard goods or related/similar products towards Asia and Europe.
* Fluent in English, both written and spoken, is required. Additional language skills are a plus
* Skilled in excel and ERP systems such as Microsoft Dynamics NAV/Business Central. PDM/PLM systems is a plus.
* Proven ability to collaborate with stakeholders across departments and manage supplier relationships effectively.
* Proven ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines effectively is highly valued.
* Previous experience working with sustainability requirements and quality assurance in the supply chain is an advantage, such as global sustainability standards (e.g., GRS, FSC, REACH).



  





**Additional information** 




 This is a parental leave cover, starting from mid-March or latest beginning April, with a duration of 12-15 months. You will be based in our Stockholm office and be part of the Design & Assortment department reporting to the Assortment Development & Sustainability Manager.
 



  





 If you feel your experience, skills and aspirations are right for this role, please send your CV today but no later than 18 of December. We look forward hearing from you!

title: Backend Engineer - Java/Golang/AI
description:
We are looking for a passionate (Backend Engineer | AI Engineer | AI Agent Developer) to join the IT studio, the team responsible for advancing the digital workplace experience. Our mission is to give every user the best possible user experience from the moment they open their device. By doing so we seek to remove the friction of work, unblocking users to be more productive—anywhere, anytime—with simplicity and safety—with an experience that makes the client one of the best places to work.
   

  

 As an engineer supporting the "AI Momentum" strategy within the Identity and Access Management squad, you will be instrumental in integrating the latest AI tools with our IAM landscape, to enhance security and authorization controls. This involves building an MCP Gateway integration with our SSO platforms, along other projects related with employee identity access management. You will also contribute to the adoption of AI Agents as first-class citizens for our IAM environment. You will assist in upskilling IT teams in AI fluency, fostering a culture of competency and shared language through knowledge sharing sessions.
   

  

 What you’ll do
   

  

* Proactively collaborate closely with engineers, product designers, and product owners to build solutions that drive the evolution of client's Identity Management landscape towards an AI-first company keeping security as our guiding light.
* Proactively identify potential risks introduced by third party tools that are AI-enabled and integrated into client's collaborative tooling suite and build solutions to minimize this impact.
* Take operational responsibility for the components that you develop.


 Who you are
   

  

* Experienced in designing, building, testing, debugging and optimizing code of agentic systems/workflows, MCP servers and latest AI-tools.
* Experienced in designing, building, testing, debugging and optimizing code of identity authentication and authorization integrations, using standard protocols included, but not limited to, SAML, OIDC, Oauth 2.0.
* Coding languages you have experience on ideally are Java and Go.
* Love working on a team where you constantly learn, experiment, and iterate quickly.


 Where you'll be
   

  

* This role is based in UK or Sweden.
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! We are a remote-first squad distributed between the US and Europe.

title: Web Developer (PHP, Laravel, Livewire, Tailwind)
description:
Bli en del av Refunder - Sveriges största cashback-sajt med över 900 000 smarta medlemmar! Vi söker nu en webbutvecklare med passion för Laravel och hög kvalitet, som vill vara med och bygga vidare på vår plattform.
 



  





  




**Rollen och vår teknik** 

  





 Vi är ett litet, dedikerat gäng utvecklare som älskar att bygga smarta lösningar för våra medlemmar. Hos oss får du vara med och påverka hela produktionskedjan, från idé till färdig produkt. Vi gillar att testa nya saker, fatta snabba beslut och se idéer bli verklighet. Här slipper du byråkrati och långa beslutsvägar -
 **We must ship!** 




  




**Vår teknikstack** 

  





 Vi arbetar dagligen i en modern
 **TALL-stack** 
 :
 


* Tailwind CSS
* Alpine.js
* Laravel
* Livewire



  





 Andra buzzwords som beskriver det vi jobbar med:
 


* AWS
* Kubernetes
* MariaDB
* Redis
* Elasticsearch
* Pest
* ChatGPT
* Github



  





 Gemensamt för alla projekt är att vi alltid använder
 **Laravel** 
 . Vi har även några mindre sidoprojekt som använder
 **Vue.js** 
 som frontendramverk.
 



  




**Din profil och erfarenhet** 

  





 Rollen har ett fullstack-perspektiv men med ett tydligt fokus på backend.
 



  




**Krav:** 

  




* Mycket goda kunskaper i PHP
* Gedigen erfarenhet av Laravel
* Erfarenhet av fullstack-utveckling med fokus på backend
* Bra koll på MySQL (schema/design, indexering, queries)
* Förståelse för hur REST API:er fungerar
* Erfarenhet av GIT



  




**Plus i kanten:** 

  




* Erfarenhet av Vue.js/Vite eller moderna frontend-flöden
* Kunskap om Elasticsearch/OpenSearch
* Erfarenhet av testning (PHPUnit eller Pest)
* Erfarenhet av Tailwind CSS
* Docker och enkel CI/CD (t.ex. GitHub Actions eller Jenkins)
* Erfarenhet av Redis, köer och cache-strategier
* Grundläggande kunskaper inom AWS eller annan molnplattform
* Erfarenhet av loggning/monitorering (vi använder Sentry)
* Tänk kring prestandaoptimering, säkerhet och GDPR/Privacy-by-design



  




**Varför Refunder?** 

  





 Hos oss får du bli en viktig del av ett litet, effektivt och lättsamt team där du har stort inflytande över produkten och de tekniska valen.
 



  




**Vi erbjuder:** 

  




* Flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet att jobba hemifrån
* Centralt kontor i Stockholm (Tegnérgatan 8)
* Frihet att välja din egen datorutrustning
* Snabba beslutsvägar och en kultur där idéer uppmuntras och testas tidigt
* Tid för kvalitet: Code reviews, labbdagar, kunskapsdelning och fokus på att minimera långsiktig teknisk skuld



  




**Lite om oss** 

  





 Refunder är Sveriges största cashback-sajt (och den näst största i Polen) med över 900 000 smarta shoppare. title: Android Developer
description:
Lighthouse is a squad within Client Platform R&D studio that empowers hundreds of client developers to work efficiently on performance and stability in the apps, ultimately enabling them to deliver an awesome experience to billions of users. We make this happen by providing observability and tools that collect performance and stability measurements and data, serving it to the feature squads in a clear and actionable way. We collaborate closely with our customers in Experience mission to understand needs and build a platform that fits. At times, we team up directly with feature squads to integrate our tooling and use it to identify and implement improvements directly in the app.
   

  

 Right now we are working on our next generation observability platform, OoPS, which will gather different observations from the clients into one view, enabling developers to understand what is happening at any given time, to find bottlenecks and better act on bugs and regressions.
   

  

 What you'll Do
   

  

* Develop tooling for measuring and acting on quality and stability related issues
* Work across the stack, including gathering the right information in the Android client, processing and aggregating the data in the backend, and presenting it in Backstage.
* Occasionally perform deep-dive Android profiling, including system tracing, memory analysis, and app startup optimization, to identify and resolve performance bottlenecks.
* Act as an expert of quality and performance, and proactively find opportunities to improve awareness, attribution, and actionability of quality issues.
* Become a developer advocate improving technical communications with client developers and foster a deeper understanding to their problems and needs
* Innovate at a high pace to support development at scale


 Who you are
   

  

* You have 5+ years of experience as a Software Engineer, specializing in Android development, and are open to working across different platforms.
* You have some experience in designing and building distributed services in Java/Kotlin
* You are familiar with agile practices, testing methodologies, and CI/CD.
* You are comfortable working with BQ, data analysis, and SQL queries in order to make data-driven decisions.
* You are a solutions-oriented team player; you are flexible and ready to do what‘s best for your customers (in this case, the customers are other teams at the company)
* You have a great ability to learn, and you are eager to expand your areas of expertise.
* You have a passion for supporting and enabling others to become more productive.
* You have a strong quality mindset and care for the overall performance of the product.


**Required Skills (just a Few Examples)**
* Android Platform Knowledge
* Systems-Level Engineering
* Cross-Functional Collaboration
* Data Engineering
* Programming in Kotlin


 Start ASAP
   

  

 Length 3 months with possibility to extend

title: Android Developer/Scrum Master
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Lång erfarenhet av Android app-utveckling
* Erfarenhet som Scrum Master
* Civil- eller högskoleingenjör inom data- eller elektroteknik, eller motsvarande erfarenhet
* Van användare av GIT, JIRA och Android Studio
* Erfarenhet av AOSP och Android Automotive OS
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 02-12-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Software Engineer GenAI
description:
Vill du vara med och forma framtidens AI-lösningar hos Svenska Spel – där teknik, säkerhet och innovation går hand i hand för att skapa nytta för både spelare, kollegor och samhället i stort?
   

  

 Hos oss får du en central roll i att utveckla hur vi arbetar med AI där du kommer ingå i ett centralt team, AI Enablement, vars uppdrag är att stötta övrig organisation med AI-lösningar - från idé till implementation. Du kommer att röra dig i gränslandet mellan affärsutveckling, lösningsutveckling och systemutveckling, där din kod bidrar till att göra AI till en naturlig och säker del av vår vardag.
   

  

**Vad kommer du att göra?**
 Som AI Software Engineer i AI Enablement-teamet får du vara med och forma hur Svenska Spel bygger, integrerar och skalar användningen av AI i hela koncernen. Du arbetar både nära verksamheten och i tekniska miljöer där tillgänglighet, säkerhet och kvalitet står i fokus.
   

  

 Rollen kombinerar teknisk systemutveckling med innovation och affärsförståelse – du blir en viktig länk mellan våra AI-tjänster och den infrastruktur som gör dem möjliga.
   

  

**Du Kommer Bland Annat Att**
* Bygga och vidareutveckla agenter, LLM- och RAG-lösningar (retrieval-augmented generation) som stödjer verksamhetens behov.
* Utveckla och underhålla API:er, integrationer och tjänster som kopplar samman AI-lösningar med övriga system.
* Arbeta med IAM (Identity and Access Management), dataflöden och tekniska plattformar för att säkerställa säkra och skalbara AI-lösningar.
* Samarbeta med AI-Enablement-teamet, dataingenjörer, ML-experter och produktutvecklare för att skapa robusta och hållbara tekniska lösningar.
* Delta i kravanalys, design, testning och kvalitetssäkring av nya funktioner – från prototyp till produktion.
* Bidra till förbättring av processer och plattformar, och driva arbetet med standarder och best practice för AI-utveckling.


**Nyfiken på mer om teamet?**
 Spana in klippet med Erik och Hanna som berättar mer om teamet inom AI Enablement och hur det är att jobba hos oss 🎥 🌟
   

  

**Är du den som kommer att göra det?**
 Vi söker dig som kombinerar teknisk nyfikenhet med ett affärsmässigt sinne.
   

  

 Du trivs med att röra dig mellan teknik och tillämpning, och gillar att omsätta komplexa idéer till fungerande kod som skapar värde.
   

  

 Vi tror att du har
   

  

* Erfarenhet av systemutveckling och integration, gärna i miljöer med API-utveckling och IAM-lösningar.
* Kunskap inom Python, Typescript eller .NET samt erfarenhet av CI/CD-flöden.
* Förståelse för hur AI-tjänster integreras i tekniska miljöer, inklusive frågor kring dataåtkomst, säkerhet och kvalitet.
* Förmåga att samarbeta tvärfunktionellt och kommunicera tekniska lösningar på ett tydligt sätt.
* Relevant högskole- eller civilingenjörsutbildning, exempelvis inom datavetenskap, systemvetenskap eller motsvarande område.


 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av
   

  

* Molnplattformar som Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
* Kubernetes, DevOps eller MLOps-miljöer.
* Arbetssätt inom AI-utveckling, agentarkitektur eller LLM-tillämpningar.


**Om Tech på Svenska Spel**
 På Svenska Spel hanterar vi 10 000 000 transaktioner varje dag, året runt och på sex dagar har vi hanterat samma transaktionsvolym som den största pengaöverföringsappen gör på en månad. Varje dag utvecklar, driftar och supportar vi ett av världens mest avancerade spelsystem, vi är med andra ord ett techbolag som sysslar med spel - inte tvärtom. Det här kommer med ett ansvar, både för folkets drömmar och spänning, men även för deras spelande. Vi flyttar ständigt fram gränserna för vår tech och låter aldrig vår Drömmaskin stå still. Kom och utveckla den med oss!
   

  

**Vi är Svenska Spel**
 Svenska Spel är hela Sveriges spelbolag. Vi skapar hållbara och roliga spelupplevelser som bidrar till ett bättre Sverige. Genom spel som Triss, Stryktipset och Oddset ger vi våra fyra miljoner kunder spänning, glädje och drömmar. Våra spel är enkla och trygga och oavsett om man spelar online eller fysiskt, själv eller tillsammans med andra, så ska upplevelsen alltid vara positiv. Vi vill att fler ska spela hållbart hos oss och vår verksamhet ska bedrivas på ett socialt, ekonomiskt och miljömässigt ansvarsfullt sätt. Varje år går överskottet till statskassan. Vi är Sveriges största idrottssponsor och investerar nära 300 miljoner kronor årligen i svensk idrott. Vi är modiga, nyfikna och strävar efter enkelhet i allt vi gör samt skapar resultat tillsammans.
   

  

*Är du nyfiken på våra förmåner? Då hittar du dem här!*
**A** 
**nsökan och kontaktuppgifter**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med placering i Stockholm eller i Visby med möjlighet till flexibelt distansarbete. På Svenska Spel gör vi jobbet där det passar bäst - ibland är det hemma och ibland på kontoret.
   

  

 Vi jobbar löpande med urval och intervjuer så tveka inte med att skicka in din ansökan redan idag.
   

  

 För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Erik Andersson, Chef AI Enablement & CareTech, erik.andersson@svenskaspel.se
   

  

 För frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta Team Talent Acquisition, teamta@svenskaspel.se
